Text:
According to this review the blu-ray really is amazing, look at the screenshots! Thanks.

http://www.blu-ray.com/movies/The-Quiet-Man-Blu-ray/58675/#Overview

Thanks a lot, this is one of my all-time favorite movies and quality is indeed amazing.
No subtitles included in this blu-ray but I simply converted 29.970 fps english subs found on the net to 23.976 with Subtitle Workshop, it works perfectly.

A/10, V/10, M 10, a classic, Thank you DownTYU, the quality of this 60 year old movie is simply awesome, the sound is better than excellent.  A movie with John Wayne and Maureen O'Hara, simply good acting and great colour scenery makes for a great movie, listen for the great tenor voice in the early Irish pub scene, when the patrons sing "The wild Colonial Boy".

This deserves a double thanks I guess, when I really like a movie I usually download several different rips so I can compare A/V quality and keep the best one but in this case no one else uploaded this movie, whether it's here or on rutracker.
So Thank You very much for this :)
